DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the food effect on the pharmacokinetics of eperisone HCl SR tablet
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Food Effect on the Pharmacokinetics of Eperisone HCl SR Tablet 75mg
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects age between 20 and 55 signed informed consent Hypotension or hypertension has a history of allergy reaction of this drug or other drugs
